messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
LGTM for implementation; reserving judgement on the API addition

Calling Russ for API review.

On Tue, Feb 26, 2013 at 7:11 PM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM for implementation; reserving judgement on the API addition
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/7369055/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7369055/>
>

Awesome... the new paranoid checks in
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=faf5a57def8cc09e86afdb6e884a35f9f93ddc09
found
that this CL has a missing test server Close call.

Will fix before submitting.

On Wed, Feb 27, 2013 at 8:36 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=02ee8f7b9a17 ***

net/http: add Transport.ResponseHeaderTimeout

Update issue 3362

R=golang-dev, adg, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7369055
